content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'kannainput_jithendra231221_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [data_source] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://kannainput@jithendra231221.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE clean.validate_set (
	[ata] nvarchar(4000),
	[atd] nvarchar(4000),
	[end_lat] nvarchar(4000),
	[end_lon] nvarchar(4000),
	[end_port] nvarchar(4000),
	[end_port_sea_area] nvarchar(4000),
	[id] nvarchar(4000),
	[in_port] nvarchar(4000),
	[lat] nvarchar(4000),
	[lon] nvarchar(4000),
	[mmsi] nvarchar(4000),
	[node] nvarchar(4000),
	[speed] nvarchar(4000),
	[start_port] nvarchar(4000),
	[timestamp] nvarchar(4000),
	[vessel_type] nvarchar(4000),
	[voyage] nvarchar(4000),
	[dq_check] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'cleanse/marine_poc/validate_set_json/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_source],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT  top 20 * FROM clean.validate_set
GO
